title: Designing Multimedia Video-Based Pedagogical Approaches in Higher Education Science Disciplines

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Fundamental Scientific Concepts and Job-Related Basic Knowledge
context.additional_context: A blended online learning course using digital devices and video-based instructional methods to strengthen science knowledge delivery and practical skill training.

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce core steps of scientific experiments with 85% accuracy after watching instructional videos explaining experimental procedures.
Learners can analyze multimedia video materials to explain at least three interconnections among scientific concepts.
Learners can submit project deliverables proposing science-based problem-solving solutions applicable to workplace environments using video-based case studies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
